title: Adobe XD kit
subtitle: Adobe XD editorial kit
header: I was invited to participate in the release of Adobe series of free UI Kits and resources for the design community created by prominent designers around the globe.
Being extremely excited about this opportunity, I decided to create something fresh and unique to make sure all Adobe XD users will benefit from this UI Kit.

content.header: This editorial and e-commerce UI kit features 18 different design pages and more than 120 various components.
paragraphs: What makes this UI Kit particularly unique and different from many others is the content. We all know that content is king. I decided to further capitalize on this.

content.header: My Experience, Awards & Pulications, and own vibes dor sure!
paragraphs: In March 2016, we launched our TV channel, VICELAND with all original content made by VICE. The network was a way for us to understand our world across a broad range of subjects, tones, and high and low cultures. Together with Gretel, we created a brand identity system with a functional aesthetic completely counter to any TV channel to date.
